org.jaudiotagger.audio
Class AbstractAudioHeader

java.lang.Object
  org.jaudiotagger.audio.AbstractAudioHeader
Direct Known Subclasses:
MP3AudioHeader
public abstract class AbstractAudioHeader
extends java.lang.Object

The abstract superclass that provides a way to establish where the actual audio begins within an Audio File, and returns additional data about the audio file itself.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
Paul Taylor
